text: @JohnCornyn @DailyCaller She’s absolutely correct. And you shouldn’t be on Twitter with all the #COVID19 cases spiraling out of control in #Texas . You and that other greedy, incompetent bigot @GregAbbott_TX have your hands too full to be tweeting. #VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare
